code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     // remove created from super     context.removeComponent("properties").     PropertiesComponent pc = new PropertiesComponent().     pc.setLocations(new String[] { "file:./src/test/resources/org/apache/camel/component/properties/myproperties.properties" }).     context.addComponent("properties", pc).     return context. }
